instructions.para: Enter "xyz" to denote that the item requires subject headings from local catalogers.
Enter "xyz" to denote that the item requires subject headings from local catalogers.
Enter "xyz" to denote that the item requires subject headings from local catalogers.

customization.para: Enter "xyz" to request the creation and/or review of values for one or more of the following fields by UWL cataloging staff:
Geographic fields: Geographic Coverage, Interviewee Birthplace, Performer Birthplace, Recording Location, Printer Location, Publisher Location
Enter "xyz" to request the creation and/or review of values for one or more of the following fields by UWL cataloging staff:
Geographic fields: Geographic Coverage, Interviewee Birthplace, Performer Birthplace, Recording Location, Printer Location, Publisher Location

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation.
Defined this property as a place for messages to local catalogers; added input instructions for "xyz."
Added custom instructions for Sephardic Studies Digital Collection - p16786coll3
